medical_history.chief_complaint: Suprapubic and left lower quadrant abdominal pain
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain began almost a week ago, described as dull, aching; grew worse until 3 days prior to presentation when he felt better. Pain returned after eating shellfish the following day. Experienced intermittent chills throughout the last week, denies fevers, has decreased appetite, no nausea/vomiting, and pain not exacerbated by meals.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hemorrhoids; previous surgeries include lipoma excision, hemorrhoidectomy, knee arthroscopy.
